languages.text: "Даже тебя, нелюдь, я бы убила быстро — в этом разница между нечестивыми ксеносами и слугами Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Даже тебя, нелюдь, я бы убила быстро — в этом разница между нечестивыми ксеносами и слугами Императора".

languages.text: "Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Даже тебя, нелюдь, я бы убила быстро — в этом разница между нечестивыми ксеносами и слугами Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."
"Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."
"Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."
"Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."
"Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."
"Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."

languages.text: 「たとえ貴様のような外道であっても、私は速やかに殺してやる。それが、邪悪なる異種族と皇帝に仕える者との違いだ」
languages.original_text: "Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「たとえ貴様のような外道であっても、私は速やかに殺してやる。それが、邪悪なる異種族と皇帝に仕える者との違いだ」

languages.text: "Selbst Euch, Dämon, würde ich schnell töten. Das ist der Unterschied zwischen unheiligen Xenos und Dienern des Imperators."
languages.original_text: "Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst Euch, Dämon, würde ich schnell töten. Das ist der Unterschied zwischen unheiligen Xenos und Dienern des Imperators."

languages.text: « Aussi monstrueux que vous soyez, je vous accorderais une mort rapide. Telle est la différence entre les xénos impies et les serviteurs de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Aussi monstrueux que vous soyez, je vous accorderais une mort rapide. Telle est la différence entre les xénos impies et les serviteurs de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «Te mataría rápidamente incluso a ti, demonio; esa es la diferencia entre los impíos xenos y los siervos del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Te mataría rápidamente incluso a ti, demonio; esa es la diferencia entre los impíos xenos y los siervos del Emperador».

languages.text: “即便是你，恶魔，我杀你的时候也会给你个痛快——这就是邪恶的异形与帝皇忠仆之间的区别。”
languages.original_text: "Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “即便是你，恶魔，我杀你的时候也会给你个痛快——这就是邪恶的异形与帝皇忠仆之间的区别。”

languages.text: "Öyle bir sonu sana bile layık görmem zebani. Uğursuz zenolar ile İmparator'un hizmetkârları arasındaki en büyük fark da bu ya zaten."
languages.original_text: "Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle bir sonu sana bile layık görmem zebani. Uğursuz zenolar ile İmparator'un Hizmetkârları arasındaki en büyük fark da bu ya zaten."

languages.original_text: "Even you, fiend, I would kill quickly — that is the difference between unholy xenos and servants of the Emperor."
